data.name: 0000 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I headed to the building where the first-year classrooms are, trying to find Haruhi…

data.name: 0001 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …and was soon able to find her wandering the corridors.

data.name: 0003 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, Haruhi, wait up! Hey!

data.name: 0004 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What now?! And why are you by yourself? What about Mikuru and Yuki and Koizumi?

data.name: 0005 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: They went to talk to the Computer Club more. Apparently something was bothering them.

data.name: 0006 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm. Well whatever, splitting into two groups might not be such a bad idea.

data.name: 0007 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Back to you, where in the world do you think you're going!?

data.name: 0008 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Where of course, is the scene of where the man-eating classroom incident all started.

data.name: 0009 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They say you should return to the scene of the crime a hundred times, don't they?

data.name: 0010 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Certainly they say cracking a case requires frequently returning to the crime scene but,

data.name: 0011 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This isn't some police drama. In the first place, where even is the crime scene?

data.name: 0012 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That is, of course…Obviously…

data.name: 0013 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well that's what we're looking for!

data.name: 0014 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …See what I mean? You cant just run around willy-nilly.

data.name: 0015 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't have any idea where you're going right?

data.name: 0016 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then, what do you think we should be doing?

data.name: 0017 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't know.

data.name: 0018 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Are you kidding me? Don't say something so self-important when you have no idea either.

data.name: 0019 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But unlike you, I have enough sense to think about where I'm going before running there.

data.name: 0020 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We don't have time for that.

data.name: 0021 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's way more efficient to think about it while you're running there!

data.name: 0022 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wonder…If she was always this kind of person.

data.name: 0023 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Enough! I get it already so hurry up over here, Kyon!

data.name: 0024 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I suddenly felt tired, so Haruhi walked right up to me and grabbed my hand.

data.name: 0025 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I staggered along while being forcefully dragged by Haruhi.

data.name: 0026 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: L-like I said, where are we even going!

data.name: 0027 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I told you!

data.name: 0028 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We'll think about it while we run!

data.name: 0029 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Jeez, we haven't discovered anything yet! Where's the man-eating classroom!?

data.name: 0030 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You know finding it won't be so easy don't you?

data.name: 0031 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If even that Computer Society was able to find it,

data.name: 0032 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: how hard could it be for me.

data.name: 0033 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She doesn't seem to doubt the existence of the man-eating classroom in the slightest.

data.name: 0034 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I'm not mistaken, Koizumi said something like…

data.name: 0035 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The more Haruhi believes in mysterious rumors, the more they slowly become reality.

data.name: 0036 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's even possible that abnormal space I saw could end up multiplying in droves.

data.name: 0037 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to avoid such a situation.

data.name: 0038 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to but…How am I supposed to stop Haruhi's influence?

data.name: 0039 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi, listen up.

data.name: 0040 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …What is it?

data.name: 0041 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we just run around blindly, we wont discover anything.

data.name: 0042 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's make a plan here.

data.name: 0043 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A plan…Then do you have some kind of plan in mind?

data.name: 0044 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No.

data.name: 0045 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then that's completely out of the question.

data.name: 0046 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Calm down. It's true that we may not have a plan yet, but I know what were missing.

data.name: 0047 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Missing…What?

data.name: 0048 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Information. We're overwhelmingly lacking in information.

data.name: 0049 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …We need to gather more intelligence?

data.name: 0050 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right.

data.name: 0051 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Where can we find more?

data.name: 0052 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Maybe Yuki discovered some ancient ghost stories in the old literature club's journals.

data.name: 0053 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Maybe we should see if there are any other eye-witnesses besides the Computer Society.

data.name: 0054 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: T-that's true but,

data.name: 0055 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I knew it, looks like field work is the only option. I see what to do lets go!

data.name: 0056 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So where are we going? We just talked about this!

data.name: 0057 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't like this, we'll go in circles.

data.name: 0058 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I sighed while concealing my growing impatience.

data.name: 0059 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi.

data.name: 0060 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …What? Why the soft voice all of a sudden?

data.name: 0061 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm just saying, maybe we should calm ourselves a bit more.

data.name: 0062 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What will we do if the man-eating classroom escapes while we're calming down?!

data.name: 0063 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As if the classroom is going to run away.

data.name: 0064 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A while back, remember when we walked around town looking for mysteries?

data.name: 0065 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We weren't able to get the others, it was just you and me walking all over town, that time…

data.name: 0066 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …It's happened before, but what's the point?

data.name: 0067 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This reminds me of back then, when we were just strolling around peacefully.

data.name: 0068 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think just strolling around the school like that would be nice.

data.name: 0069 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: When you're impatient, you cant see what's right in front of you.

data.name: 0070 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We ought to slow down the pace.

data.name: 0071 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Uu~…

data.name: 0072 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well…I only understand some of what you just said.

data.name: 0073 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Who knows where unnatural phenomena could be lurking, so to not overlook anything--

data.name: 0074 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're saying we should look around thoroughly right?

data.name: 0075 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: W-well, as long as you understand it's all good.

data.name: 0076 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi convinced herself. I shrugged my shoulders on the inside. Good grief.

data.name: 0077 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now all that's left is to pray nothing happens.

data.name: 0078 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey Kyon, I was struck with an idea while you we're talking.

data.name: 0079 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Struck?

data.name: 0080 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah. The man-eating classroom showed up in a classroom that shouldn't exist: Class 1-10.

data.name: 0081 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If that's the case, we should head to the floor that has class 9!

data.name: 0082 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When you think about it, if it was in a classroom nearby we would've found it by now!

data.name: 0083 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, Oi! Wait up, that's--

data.name: 0084 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In the end, Haruhi stormed off without even listening to my advice.

data.name: 0085 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As you rush off, the only thing forgotten is my advice, huh?

data.name: 0086 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right here! There's no about it this is the crime scene!

data.name: 0087 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No doubt huh…What kind of basis do you have to be so certain?

data.name: 0088 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There is no basis! But, my intuition is telling me here's the spot.

data.name: 0089 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's an awfully convenient intuition you have there.

data.name: 0090 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright Kyon, let's count all of the doors from here.

data.name: 0091 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Count the doors?

data.name: 0092 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right. Now that I think about it these classroom doors all look the same don't they?

data.name: 0093 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If one were added, you wouldn't immediately notice right?

data.name: 0094 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well…That might be true.

data.name: 0095 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In this featureless hallway where everything looks similar, certainly I might not notice.

data.name: 0096 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So like I said, count the number of doors…

data.name: 0097 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Here's door 1-6 to 1-9, since there's 2 doors per classroom…

data.name: 0098 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If what should be the 8th door is the 9th or 10th, that's bingo.

data.name: 0099 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That would prove that the man-eating classroom is somewhere in this hallway.

data.name: 0100 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd like to say that such a childish seeming technique couldn't be correct, but I cant.

data.name: 0101 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, you stand watch here.

data.name: 0102 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If I get trapped in the man-eating classroom, you're in charge of rescuing me.

data.name: 0103 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Yeah yeah.

data.name: 0104 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sorry but that's a job too big for my hands...Says the guy with experience.

data.name: 0105 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If by some chance we fall into such a situation, I'll have to go call Nagato.

data.name: 0106 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay, Here I go...one!

data.name: 0107 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She opened the door energetically, slammed it shut, and ran on to the next door.

data.name: 0108 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Can't we use all that energy for something more effect…

data.name: 0109 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For example, spinning a hamster wheel to generate electricity or something.

data.name: 0110 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Otherwise, you could dangle a bicycle or something around here and spin the tires to…

data.name: 0111 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Huh? I suddenly saw something in the corner of my eye.

data.name: 0112 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The classroom label…

data.name: 0113 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The label right above me read "1 - 6."

data.name: 0114 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see, if you build on that…

data.name: 0115 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I remove this "1 - 6" label, that should do the trick right?

data.name: 0116 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll go down and shift "1 - 7" through "1 - 9" in order.

data.name: 0117 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, I don't actually have to shift everything. If there's just a hint it's been shifted...

data.name: 0118 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In that case, it would look like Class 1-10 was just a prank by someone…

data.name: 0119 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Could I just make up such a story?

data.name: 0120 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't know the likelihood, but that method might work. It's worth a shot.

data.name: 0121 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A-alright...That should be good. Now to remove the other class labels…

data.name: 0122 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyonnn! It seems there's only 8 doors after all!

data.name: 0123 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Woah!

data.name: 0124 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That was close. It doesn't seem like she saw me removing the plates…

data.name: 0125 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi finished counting all the doors in the blink of an eye.

data.name: 0126 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's weird isn't it, I thought for sure this was the place…

data.name: 0127 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi is standing at the end of the hallway and turning her neck around.

data.name: 0128 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But at this rate, it's going to be difficult to shift labels 7 through 9.

data.name: 0129 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What should I do with the 6th class label in my hands...?

data.name: 0130 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If Haruhi found out, who knows what she might say.

data.name: 0131 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For now I'll put it back where it belongs.

data.name: 0132 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah I'll--Oh.

data.name: 0133 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon? Did something happen?

data.name: 0134 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No. I took a close look at this area but couldn't find anything odd.

data.name: 0135 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh...I really thought it was here.

data.name: 0136 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi dropped her shoulders in heart-broken disappointment.

data.name: 0137 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Who knows when this could come in handy later...I'll just hold onto to it for now.

data.name: 0138 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I slid the 6th classroom label into my pocket.

data.name: 0139 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's wrong?

data.name: 0140 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nothing really.

data.name: 0141 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like she didn't notice me putting it in my pocket.

data.name: 0142 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If she saw that would be a huge mess after all.

data.name: 0143 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But that's a real shame.

data.name: 0144 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No kidding. I really thought it was here.

data.name: 0145 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I wonder if our other task force found anything?

data.name: 0146 (371.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Should we meet up and pool our info?

data.name: 0147 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yeah, let's do that.

data.name: 0148 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi took out her cellphone and started calling someone.

data.name: 0149 (371.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ah, Koizumi? You've done enough over there. I need you to join us here.

data.name: 0150 (371.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now then, I wonder if they found out anything useful.

data.name: 0151 (371.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Say to collect more information.

data.name: 0152 (371.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Reminisce on the past.

data.name: 0153 (371.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: It can't be helped, put it back.

data.name: 0154 (371.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Hide it in your pocket.
